wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Patrick Hamill (born 25 February 1984) is a Scottish professional footballer. He has played for Heart of Midlothian, Leicester City, Livingston, Queen of the South, Raith Rovers, Formartine United, Airdrieonians and Bonnyrigg Rose.

response: *2 August 2006 – Joe Hamill from Leicester City to Livingston, Free

On 29 January 2010, Queens announced that Tosh had moved to Livingston for the rest of the season in a loan deal, with Joe Hamill moving in the opposite direction. Tosh scored two goals in 15 league appearances for the Almondvale club during his loan spell.
